issue.title: [C++] The bytes_allocated_ in CudaContextImpl isn't initialized
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2455](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2455). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The atomic counter `bytes_allocated_` in `CudaContextImpl` isn't initialized, leading to failure of cuda-test on windows.
